name: Cave Jumper
description:
Cave Jumper is a game where you have to prove your worth by jumping around in the mysterious cave, avoiding falling rocks and gain the biggest highscore!

Controls:

Arrow keys / Mouse Swipe: Jump

That's it!

NOTE: Game is not optimized for fullscreen. Please play in the default resolution. (450 x 800)

This game was part of Ludum Dare #37. Here is my entry:

Ludum Dare #37 Entry
